text:
Hi, I am using the Fop text renderer to produce ascii text. The Fop version that
I am using is Fop-0.20.2. The problem that I am having is when I use a space in
any text inside my fo:block the txt file has something like 6 extra spaces.
Eg: if inside the fo:block I had "formatting objects" it would appear as:
"formatting      objects".  If anyone has any idea how I can fix or get around
this problem please let me know: amitr@hemtech.co.za

Thank you and happy foping...
creator: amitr@hemtech.co.za

text:
There are valid reasons to add spaces, for example if text-align="justify"
is specified. Without knowledge of the circumstances, nothing can be done.
A test case would have helped.
creator: j3322ptm@yahoo.de
